description: (*) Students take the English placement test for their current English level. Students who obtain IELTS 6.0+, TOEFL iBT 60+, Linguaskill 160+ or equivalent are granted direct entry to the degree program.

regulationsFeeChanges: Tuition fees are subject to annual review (increase/decrease). The increase will not exceed 10% each year. Greenwich Vietnam will publish information concerning fee changes if applicable.
